quotes.title: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.title: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.title: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.title: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.title: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.title: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.title: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.title: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller
